title: The Other Dark
description: In 1985, Rochester, Minnesota was the scene of several shocking murders in which the bodies of the victims were exsanguinatedâ€”drained of blood. Court Aronson becomes enthralled by the strange deaths because they bear a likeness to tales of vampires. But when his friend suggests they sneak into the Drake house (the scene of one of the murders), Court discovers that there is a more horrifying story behind the murders.
author: Ronan Gallagher
